EmailTemplate.name: CT Tier1 Rep Adjacency Email
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Customer_Transition__c.Account_OMX_Key__c} - {!Customer_Transition__c.Account_Name__c} Tier 1 Alert
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Tier 1 Support Team:
Please be advised this OD North Customer has been placed in a status of ON DECK.
We have determined that the Customer is a Tier 1 Customer. Please contact the Sales Representative that manages the account to determine which Tier 1 Partner this Customer will be using.
Link to Customer: {!Customer_Transition__c.Link}
Thank you for your support.
BSD SALES OPERATIONS TEAM
